style.name: skin_hover
style.onout.mouse: copy(layer[info].html, default_tooltip); set(crop, 0|0|200|90); set(layer[info].bgborder, 0); set(layer[info2].visible,false); set(layer[info].visible, true); set(layer[info].css, font-family: Open Sans; text-transform: uppercase; padding:0px 30px; color:#0A0A0A; font-weight: 600; text-align: center; font-size:14px;);
